item.title: ‘The History of Sound’ Trailer: Paul Mescal and Josh O’Connor Star in Gay Historical Romance
item.description: Mubi has released the first trailer for “The History of Sound,” a gay romance movie starring Paul Mescal and Josh O’Connor that was nominated for the Palme d’Or at this year&#8
